Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to reintroduce and pass, and the president to sign, The Ensuring Diversity in Community Banking Act of 2024.
Items.MatterName: Ensuring Diversity in Community Banking Act of 2024.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to reintroduce and pass, and the Governor to sign legislation, which would establish reciprocity between New York City and State registries of Minority and Women-owned Business Enterprises (MWBEs).
Items.MatterName: Establish reciprocity between NYC and State registries of Minority and Women-owned Business Enterprises.
